name: Heurist
description: Heurist is a decentralized AI-as-a-Service cloud. Heurist aggregates compute resources from individual GPU owners and data centers to provide serverless AI services. Heurist's API-first infrastructure eliminates the need for developers to manage GPU machines, enabling cost-efficient, censorship-free AI integration with APIs. Heurist is building an AI application ecosystem powered by decentralized compute. The AI products include Heurist Imagine (AI image generator with NFT minting and create-to-earn rewards), Pondera (AI chatbot), and Heurist Search (AI-powered Search Engine)
